idea-plugin.name: DtoToMyBatisResultMap
idea-plugin.change-notes:
New Features

  • Add Generate MyBatis Select Query With Result Map

Bug Fixes

  • Code Refactoring
  • Add Type BigInteger, BigDecimal
idea-plugin.description:
Convert Dto,Entity Class To MyBatis Result Map


Enter your Class File(Dto), Mouse Right Click Generate Menu


You can see ConvertDtoToSingleResultMap, ConvertDtoToMultipleResultMap


If Click ConvertDtoToSingleResultMap, Only This class Converted On Your Clipboard


If Click ConvertDtoToMultipleResultMap, Recursive search Your Class And Converted On Your Clipboard (10Times)

action.description: Convert DTO Class To MyBatis ResultMap 1 TIMES
Convert DTO Class To MyBatis ResultMap MAX 10 TIMES
